title: RIOT actually thinks it's player base is full of stupid people
body:
A new Survey was distributed asking questions about Little Legends and Prestige skins, and instead of "What do you think of this product?", it was more centered around "Tell us, what is this product, we'd like to know if you're smart enough to even tell us!" After all this time, they'd like to know whether we think they are mainly focused on profit or player based experience even though there are thousands upon thousands of Discussions threads across all the servers about Players discontent with several products being distributed (Prestige skins in center spot light for majority of these threads) and yet, they have the balls to put out a survey to see how educated we are about their overpriced products. 

I honestly would like to know Riot, do you even care?
